```{r setup}
library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidytext)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(corrplot)
library(class)
library(caret)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning=F, error=F, message=F)
beer <- read.csv("data/brewery_beers.csv", stringsAsFactors=F)
beer_reviews <- read.csv("data/brewery_beers_reviews.csv", stringsAsFactors=F)
beer_reviews <- merge(beer, beer_reviews, by="Beer_URL", all.x=T)
beer_reviews <- beer_reviews[!duplicated(beer_reviews[,c(1:9)]),]

# custom plot theme
theme_kp <- function(){
  theme_classic(base_size=10, base_family="Avenir") %+replace%
    theme(
      plot.title=element_text(size=18, face="bold", family="Avenir"),
      panel.background  = element_blank(),
      legend.background = element_rect(fill="transparent", colour=NA),
      legend.key = element_rect(fill="transparent", colour=NA)
    )
}
```

```{r tidy}
# keep just the top 51 beer styles
styles50 <- data.frame(table(beer$Style)) %>% 
  set_colnames(c("Style", "Num")) %>% 
  top_n(50, Num)
beer_reviews <- subset(beer_reviews, Style %in% styles50$Style)

# tidy up the text
beer_tidy <- beer_reviews %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, Review_Text) %>%
  anti_join(stop_words) %>%
  count(word, Style)

head(beer_tidy)
```


# TF-IDF  

```{r fig.height=12, fig.width=8}
# take out beer names and brand names
beer_names <- unique(c(strsplit(tolower(paste(gsub("[[:punct:]]", "", beer_reviews$Style), collapse=" ")), " | / ")[[1]],
                     "marzen", "kolsch", "hefe", "triple", "dopplebock"))
exceptions <- c("extra", "strong", "bitter", "oatmeal", "brown", "heavy", "dry", "black", "mild", "amber", "red", "milk", "old",
                "malt", "fruit", "dark", "sweet", "alcohol", "liquor", "cream", "common", "tan", "smoked", "light")
beer_names <- beer_names[!(beer_names %in% exceptions)]
beer_names <- c(beer_names, paste(beer_names, "s", sep=""), paste(beer_names, "s", sep="'"))

beer_tidy_tfidf <- beer_tidy %>%
  filter(!word %in% beer_names) %>%
  group_by(word) %>%
  mutate(word_total = sum(n)) %>%
  bind_tf_idf(word, Style, n)  %>%
  subset(tf_idf > 0) %>%
  arrange(desc(tf_idf)) 

top_beers <- aggregate(Reviews ~ Style, beer_reviews, sum) %>% top_n(16, Reviews)
beer_tidy_10 <- beer_tidy_tfidf %>%
  subset(Style %in% top_beers$Style & word_total >= 10) %>%
  group_by(Style) %>%
  top_n(10, tf_idf) %>%
  arrange(Style, desc(tf_idf)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(Rank = rep(10:1, 16))

ggplot(beer_tidy_10, aes(x=as.factor(Rank), y=tf_idf)) + geom_bar(stat="identity", fill="cadetblue", alpha=0.5) + 
  coord_flip() + facet_wrap(~ Style,ncol=4) + 
  geom_text(aes(label=word, x=Rank), y=0,hjust=0) +
  labs(title="Top TF-IDF Terms for Selected Beer Styles\n", x="", y="tf-idf") + 
  theme_kp() + theme(axis.text.y=element_blank(), axis.ticks.y=element_blank()) 

```
# Correlation  

```{r textCorr}
beer_corr <- beer_tidy %>%
  group_by(Style) %>%
  mutate(Prop = n / sum(n))  %>%
  subset(n >= 5) %>%
  select(-n) %>%
  spread(Style, Prop) 

beer_corr[is.na(beer_corr)] <- 0
mycol <- colorRampPalette(c("darkgrey", "grey", "white", "cadetblue1", "cadetblue"))
corr <- cor(beer_corr[,-1], use = "pairwise.complete.obs") %>% 
  corrplot(method="color", order="hclust", diag=FALSE, 
           tl.col = "black", tl.srt = 45, tl.cex=0.6,
           col=mycol(100), 
           type="lower",title="Correlation Between Beer Styles", family="Avenir",
           mar=c(0,0,1,0))

```
# Cluster  

```{r textCluster, fig.height=6, fig.width=12}
beer_corr_t <- t(beer_corr[,-1])

wss <- 0
for(g in 1:15){
  fit <- kmeans(beer_corr_t, centers=g, nstart=10)
  wss[g] <- fit$tot.withinss
}
plot(wss)
fit_k <- kmeans(beer_corr_t, centers=8, nstart=10)
kclusters <- data.frame(num=fit_k$cluster, name=names(fit_k$cluster), row.names=NULL) %>% arrange(num)
print(kclusters)

beer_dist <- dist(beer_corr_t, method="euclidean")
fit <- hclust(beer_dist, method="ward.D")
plot(fit,main="Cluster Dendrogram of Beer Styles", family="Avenir")
rect.hclust(fit, k=8, border="cadetblue")
```

# Classify  

```{r predict}
groups <- data.frame(cutree(fit, k=8))
groups$Style <- row.names(groups)
colnames(groups) <- c("Group", "Style")
groupnames <- data.frame(
  names=c("Red Ale", "Brown and Scottish Ale","Stout and Porter", "Pilsener and Lager","IPA", "Belgian", "Gose", "Pumpkin"), 
  numbers=c(1:8), 
  stringsAsFactors=F)
groups <- merge(groups, groupnames, by.x="Group", by.y="numbers")
colnames(groups) <- c("GroupNum", "Style", "Group")

beer_kgroup <- merge(beer_reviews[beer_reviews$Style %in% groups$Style & !is.na(beer_reviews$Review_Text),], groups[,1:2], by="Style", all=T)

beer_kgroup <- beer_kgroup %>%
  select(Style, Beer_URL, Review_Text, GroupNum) %>%
  unique() %>%
  arrange(Beer_URL)

beer_corr_predict <- beer_kgroup %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, Review_Text) %>%
  anti_join(stop_words) %>%
  count(word, Beer_URL) %>%
  group_by(Beer_URL) %>%
  mutate(Prop = n / sum(n))  %>%
  subset(Prop >= .005) %>%
  select(-n) %>%
  spread(word, Prop) %>%
  left_join(beer_kgroup[,c(2,4)], by = "Beer_URL")

beer_corr_predict[is.na(beer_corr_predict)] <- 0

set.seed(1234)
subset_ids <- sample(1:length(beer_corr_predict$Beer_URL), length(beer_corr_predict$Beer_URL)*.20, replace=F)
beer_corr_subset <- beer_corr_predict[subset_ids, ]
train_ids <- sample(length(beer_corr_subset$Beer_URL), length(beer_corr_subset$Beer_URL)*.80, replace=F)
last <- length(beer_corr_predict)
train_bk <- beer_corr_subset[train_ids, -c(1,last)] # training
test_bk <- beer_corr_subset[-train_ids, -c(1,last)] # testing
train_resp <- beer_corr_subset[train_ids, c(1,last)]
test_resp <- beer_corr_subset[-train_ids, c(1,last)]

system.time(kresult <- knn(train = train_bk, test = test_bk, cl = train_resp$GroupNum, k = 1))

j <- data.frame(round(prop.table(table(kresult, test_resp$GroupNum),2),2))
colnames(j) <- c("Classification", "Actual", "Pct")
j$Classification <- factor(j$Classification, labels=groupnames$names)
j$Actual <- factor(j$Actual, labels=groupnames$names)

# final: 20% of dataset, word proportion > 0.05%, 8 cuts
ggplot(j, aes(Actual, Pct, fill=Classification)) + 
  geom_bar(stat="identity", position="dodge", alpha=0.75) +
  labs(title="Accuracy of KNN Classification into HClusters\n", y = "Percent") + theme_kp() + 
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=30, hjust=1)) + ylim(c(0,1))
```
